title: Red Hat Access Labs Newsletter - FY2017Q4

newApps.title: Red Hat Virtualization Agent (virt-who) Configuration Helper
newApps.desc: virt-who is required when working with any hypervisor if your subscription name includes the words "Virtual Datacenters", "4 Guests", or "Unlimited Guests". This app helps users configure virt-who.

newApps.title: RHEL Tuner for Oracle
newApps.desc: This app generates a script that sets the tuning parameter in the operating system, which improves Oracleâ€™s performance.

newApps.title: Storage / LVM configuration viewer
newApps.desc: Storage / LVM configuration viewer analyzes files included in a sosreport, and draws a chart to visualize logical/physical view of volume groups and partitions of disks.

kudos.author: Jiri Blaha (HeidelbergCement Group)
kudos.content: Very nice, useful tool. Thank you.

kudos.author: Xixi D'Moon (Technology Manager/Senior Principal Consultant, Red Hat)
kudos.content: Appreciate all the great work your team does with Access Labs to help customers self-solve and reduce support load.  It was a true team effort all around. I was also impressed with the fast turnarounds with the virt-who lab.
